info.author: Sean Kelly
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
**************
vodcsite.theme
**************

This package provides the theme (or "skin") for the VODC_ website (powered by
Plone_).

It was developed by the Jet Propulsion Laboratory (JPL_).

.. References:
.. _VODC: http://vodc.jpl.nasa.gov/
.. _Plone: http://plone.org/
.. _JPL: http://www.jpl.nasa.gov/


Installation
============

Use Buildout_ with the plone.recipe.zope2instance recipe.

* Add ``vodcsite.theme`` to the list of eggs to install, e.g.::

    [buildout]
    ...
    eggs =
        ...
        vodcsite.theme

* Re-run buildout, e.g. with::
  
    $ ./bin/buildout
        
You don't need to specify a ZCML slug because this package uses an `automatic
inclusion mechanism`_.


.. References:
.. _Buildout: http://www.buildout.org/
.. _`automatic inclusion mechanism`: http://pypi.python.org/pypi/z3c.autoinclude


Changelog
=========

1.0.0 — Cleaned Up
------------------

This release makes vodcsite.theme compatible with jpl.ngtheme and marks an
official release as a Python egg.


0.0.0 – Unreleased
------------------

* Initial release

This package provides the theme (or “skin”) for the VODC website (powered by Plone).

It was developed by the Jet Propulsion Laboratory (JPL).

Installation

Use Buildout with the plone.recipe.zope2instance recipe.

  • Add vodcsite.theme to the list of eggs to install, e.g.:

    [buildout]
...
eggs =
    ...
    vodcsite.theme

  • Re-run buildout, e.g. with:

    $ ./bin/buildout

You don’t need to specify a ZCML slug because this package uses an automatic inclusion mechanism.
